txt.en: Pesky cave-claws have taken up home in the Rimmon Quarry. Their burrowing is loosening the rock beneath mining platforms and should be dealt with.
You have defeated many cave-claws in the Beacon Hills.
You have defeated many cave-claws in the Beacon Hills.
Rimmon Burrowers can be found in the Rimmon Quarry.\n\nYou should defeat Rimmon Burrowers.
Cave-claws have made a home in the Rimmon Quarry after mining was recently halted.
